pages.text: A reagent which has been used in ceremonies to communicate with the dead for centuries, the Spirit Herb seems to resonate with the spirits of the deceased.$(br2)Spirit Herbs can be initially obtained by using Runic Shears on beetroot. From there, they can be crafted into seeds for further propogation.

pages.name: Spirit Herb
pages.text: Use Runic Shears on a fully grown Beetroot crop to obtain a Spirit Herb.
